attributes.action: encourage the rise of the British Empire.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: When Britain had its almighty Empire the world was a better place. I believe that if it is bought back many countries would benefit. Also it would bring law and order to the world aswell as showing other countries manners, dignity, pride and decorum. Here Ye! Here Ye!

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
